name: Safitri Yasibang
wishText: May me will always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Thank you for loving me more than others
replayText: If you want to watch it again.
